product information:
Enjoy watching movies, news, sports and much more with the Sony SDM-HS73. The innovative floating frame design of this 17-inch LCD TFT Monitor gives makes the TV look brilliant. This Flat Screen Display produces superb colors with amazing quality accuracy while built-in speakers give you excellent sound clarity. The 1280 x 1024 resolution in the Sony SDM-HS73 offers you clear, crispy, responsive and bright images when you are working, playing games or working on the internet. The option of 160 degree horizontal viewing angle on this 17-inch LCD TFT Monitor allows you to watch the TV flexibly without any kind of eyestrain. You can also connect this Flat Screen Display with your PC and or Mac.
